## Practice with Vectors

### Create a Vector

```{r}
set.seed(42)
my_runif <- runif(30)
is.vector(my_runif)
```

### Subset object my_unif

```{r}
my_runif[1:10]
my_runif[c(1:3,15:17)]
```

### Sort the vector (my_unif)

```{r}
sort(my_runif)
```

### Create a vector with character strings in it and explore sorting conventions

```{r}
char_vector <- c("hix","abd","z4","xyz","42t","Xyz")
sort(char_vector)
```
